cards.name: adventurous_spirit
cards.description: Add target Quest card from your deck, recharge pile, or discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: blast_bolt
cards.description: A long range bolt of fire that explodes on impact, dealing significant single-target damage.

cards.name: drain_touch
cards.description: A close-range attack that siphons life from a target, dealing damage and healing the caster.

cards.name: dual_shot
cards.description: Target scout based Summon you control is able to make two basic attacks this turn, instead of one.

cards.name: ensnare
cards.description: A ranged trap that ensnares a target Summon, immobilizing them from a distance and dealing a small amount of damage.

cards.name: healing_hands
cards.description: A healing spell that restores a significant amount of health to a target summon.

cards.name: life_alchemy
cards.description: Target Summon you control, it loses 25% of its max HP and restores that amount to another target Summon you control.

cards.name: rush
cards.description: Target warrior based summon you control. Until the end of this turn, its movement speed and basic attack damage are doubled, while its DEF is halved.

cards.name: sharpen_blade
cards.description: Target weapon equipped to a summon you control. Increase its base power by 10.

cards.name: spell_recall
cards.description: Cost: Send one card from your hand or the top of your deck to the recharge pile. If you do, you can add a target magician based Action card from your recharge or discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: berserker_rage
cards.description: Promote a target warrior based summon you control to the Berserker role, increasing its speed and strength.

cards.name: knighthood_ceremony
cards.description: Promote a target warrior based summon you control to the Knight role, increasing its defense and endurence significantly.

cards.name: oath_of_light
cards.description: Promote a target warrior or magician based summon you control to the Paladin role, the epitome of holy warriors in terms of defense and support.

cards.name: shadow_pact
cards.description: Promote a target magician based summon you control to the Warlock role, the epitome of dark magicians in terms of attack and defense.

cards.name: dark_altar
cards.flavor_text: The Dark Altar is a mysterious and foreboding structure, shrouded in shadows and whispers of ancient power. It is said to be a place where forbidden rituals are performed, and knowledge of the Dark is sought.
cards.description: At the end of your next turn, this building, and any Summons within the spaces it occupies, are destroyed. If a Summon was destroyed by this effect, target magician-based Summon you control becomes level 20 and you can immediately Advance using that Summon as a target.

cards.name: gignen_country
cards.flavor_text: The Gignen Country is a vast and diverse land, known for its rich history and cultural heritage. Gignen love their bustling villages in the serene countryside, their culture offers many unique traditions.

cards.name: dramatic_return!
cards.description: Trigger: A Summon you control is removed from In Play. Target that Summon in your Discard and return it to an unoccupied space within your territory with 10% HP. This effect does not trigger Summon Draws.

cards.name: graverobbing
cards.description: Trigger: A Summon you control is removed from In Play. Return target Action card from your Discard to your hand.

cards.name: apprentices_wand
cards.description: A simple wand used by apprentices to channel their magical energy.

cards.name: heirloom_sword
cards.description: A sword passed down through generations, it has done its job for each of its owners, and it will continue to do so for you.

cards.name: hunting_bow
cards.description: A bow designed for hunting, it offers functional precision and power.

cards.name: nearwood_forest_expidition
cards.flavor_text: An adventurer's rite of passage through the monster-infested Nearwood Forest.
cards.description: Target a Summon you control whose current level is less than 10. Increase the target's level by 2.

cards.name: berserker
cards.description: A frenzied warrior who channels their rage into devastating attacks, becoming a whirlwind of destruction on the battlefield.

cards.name: dark_mage
cards.description: A practitioner of shadow magic, manipulating the dark element to confound, confuse, control, and consume.

cards.name: element_mage
cards.description: A conduit of elemental magic, wielding the forces of fire, water, earth, and wind to devaste their foes.

cards.name: explorer
cards.description: A daring explorer who ventures into the unknown, using their wits and agility to navigate treacherous terrain and adapt to new environments.

cards.name: knight
cards.description: A stalwart defender clad in heavy armor to protect allies and vanquish foes.

cards.name: light_mage
cards.description: An enlightened magic wielder, harnessing the power of the element of light to heal allies and smite foes.

cards.name: magician
cards.description: A developing magic user learning to control the elements and cast powerful spells, using their intellect and creativity to overcome challenges.

cards.name: paladin
cards.description: A light magic wielding warrior who excels in both physical and magical defense, using their holy powers to protect and heal allies.

cards.name: rogue
cards.description: A cunning rogue who excels in subterfuge and precision strikes, using high risk, high reward tactics to outmaneuver opponents.

cards.name: scout
cards.description: A nimble scout who excels in reconnaissance and agility, using their speed and ranged attacks to outmaneuver opponents.

cards.name: sentinel
cards.description: A vigilant guardian who stands watch over their allies, ready to intercept threats and shield them from harm.

cards.name: warlock
cards.description: A master of dark magic who wields forbidden powers to curse enemies and cast devastating spells.

cards.name: warrior
cards.description: A fierce warrior who excels in close combat, wielding powerful weapons and armor to dominate the battlefield.

cards.name: Alpha Angar Template
cards.description: Celestial and wise, Angar are known for their strategic prowess and mastery of light magic.

cards.name: Alpha Creptilis Template
cards.description: Calculated and resilient, Creptilis balance endurance and defense while maintaining sharp focus in battle.

cards.name: Alpha Demar Template
cards.description: Inventive and clever devils, Demarkin excel in crafting and magical support.

cards.name: Alpha Fae Template
cards.description: Graceful and intelligent, Fae are well rounded for magical positions.

cards.name: Alpha Gignen Template
cards.descrtiption: Versatile and adaptive, Gignen are generalists suited to any role.

cards.name: Alpha Stoneheart Template
cards.description: Stalwart and industrious, Stoneheart are natural craftsfolk and warriors.

cards.name: Alpha Wilderling Template
cards.description: Agile and primal, Wilderlings possess keen senses and have deep rooted physical prowess.

cards.name: follow_me!
cards.description: Change the position of a target Summon you control to an unoccupied space adjacent to an 'Alrecht Barkstep, Scoutmaster' Summon you control.

cards.name: healing_touch
cards.description: A Paladin healing spell that restores a significant amount of health to a target summon.

cards.name: nightmare_pain
cards.description: Trigger: A Warlock Summon you control takes damage. Target Summon receives an equal amount of the damage dealt as Dark damage.
